dielectric.note: Setting kappa will override material. Specified thickness is in m

Chan.note: N_A and N_D must be specified even if 0. Group IV semiconductors only use groupA

impurities.notes: energy [meV] or element can be specified, if not ideal is assumed. Type can be A or D for acceptors or donors respectively. Type is A or D for acceptor or donor respectively. Concentration is in m^-3
